attributes.action: All MPs to sign their agreement to adhere to the Nuremberg Code.
attributes.additional_details:
Across the EU we see governments deciding on forced vaccination of their populations despite the covid vaccines waning efficacy and the fact this breaches the Nuremberg Code. 

The UK government should make it clear to the public at no point will they be willing to break the fundamental human rights as spelled out in the Nuremberg Code.
attributes.background:
The Government's Chairman Oliver Dowden  has not ruled out forced vaccination to the people of the UK. This is in violation of the Nuremberg Code. 
We therefore want all of our MPs to publicly state in writing they will not violate the Nuremberg Code.

rejection.details:
It is up to individual MPs whether to make public statements saying they support the Nuremberg Code, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Do not make vaccination against Covid-19 mandatory: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602282
